data.title: Family History, Genealogy and Surnames.
data.text:
Newcastle-under-Lyme__Staffordshire Rowley_Regis__Staffordshire

21-30 of 30 entries for Penkridge

Click on the title of any entry to message the author

&nbsp&nbsp1&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp 2&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp

John Anslow

Searching for father of:- John Anslow b.1822-3 in Penkridge who married Emma Banks at Rushall in 1845 (they were both living in Ryecroft}. Have traced John and Emma in censuses to Bilston. On censuses sometimes Penkridge, sometimes Bilston as birthplace. 1851 they were living with John's sister Eliza Bake, a widow. His father was also John but I cannot trace him, he was listed as a carpenter on John and Emma's marriage certificate. If anyone can help it would be much appreciated as I am really stuck.

2008

Cotterill

Thomas Cotterill (b1706) married Mary Johnson (b1701) on 17 Oct. 1736 in Penkridge. They had four children all baptised at Wollaston. They were both buried at Bradley near Stafford.

2008

Davies

I am trying to find traces of Thomas Davies, who married a Laura Ann Heath from Wolverhampton. Thomas should have been born in Penkridge in 1857, but I have been unable to find any trace of this. He and Laura had four children, Jane who married MrWhitehouse and had two boys, Cyril and Alan, Nellie who married Mr Morris and kept the flower shop in Penkridge, Herbet (my Grandfather) who married Nellie Payne from Orsett, Essex, and Fanny, who married Mr Rostance the local undertaker, apparantlya well known name in Penkridge. Any information would be appreciated.

2008

Webb/ Lakin

Looking for info on the Lakin and Webb families of Penkridge 1800/1850 Lakins originate from Rugeley where they were from Clay/Lakin family.

2007

Phebe Cliffe

Looking for any information on Phebe Cliffe who in 1851 was a Baker living and trading at Clay Street, Penkridge, she had three sons Charles,Edward,George and a daughter Frances. In the 1861 census Phebe has remarried to Edward Turner, still living at Clay Street and still Bakers by trade and they have two more children now Isaac and James Turner any information will be most helpful.

2006

OAKLEY family

I am interested in the OAKLEY family living in Penkridge c1800s. In particular I am trying to find more info about Andrew Oakley born 1866 in Penkridge but who moved to Stoke on Trent.

2005

Brooks family

I have traced my family back to an edward Brooks born in 1837. he became a bricklayer and there are lots of Brooks' in penkridge Anyone know any more?

2005

Bagnall Families in Penkridge

Any information on the Bagnall families living in Penkridge circa 1741-1891 would be greatfully received.

2004

Timbs In Penkridge

My ancestor Thomas Timbs, born in Brewood, became a saddler in Penkridge with a shop on Clay Street and Bridge Street between about 1820 and 1855. His name is mentioned in "The Good Old Grit". His son Thomas carried on the business until hedied around 1880. Daughters Elizabeth, Margaret and Fanny Timbs were living in Marsh, Penkridge in 1881. Another brother, John Timbs was my ancestor, who moved away to Cheshire. Does anyone know anything at all about this family?

2003

Tooth Family In Penkridge

I have found my great great grandad living in penkridge in a place called Marsh. He is living with a housekeeper and not his parents. What was this place Marsh in 1881? Why would a 5 year old not be living with his parents?

2003
